title: The weather outside is frightful, but our apts are delightful!
description: Where are luxury apartments in Cranston, Rhode Island? Independence Place at 75 Independence Way, that’s where! Independence Place delivers the amenities, location, and the service you expect from the community you call home. We offer online payments, online work orders, and 24-hour emergency maintenance. Our professional staff has your interests at heart. Browse through our photos and get a feel for the details that make up our living space and see the community amenities we provide. Take a look at our floor plans and select the one that meets your needs. Our apartments are designed for real living — our kitchens have all the appliances you need, we have wall-to-wall carpeting in the living room and bedrooms, the master bedroom features a walk-in closet, and you’ll love soaking in our oversized tubs. The welcome warmth of a gas fireplace can be yours at Independence Place. Do you dream of relaxing on your own private balcony, enjoying a cup of tea? Do you fantasize over doing laundry in your own apartment instead of lugging loads to the laundromat? Have you deliberated over whether driving to the gym is worth the hassle? Wonder no more. Independence Place community and apartment amenities mean you can have that cup of tea, do laundry in your in-apartment washer and dryer, and use our swimming pool, fitness center and virtual fitness room to stay in shape. Take a look and see all the amenities we offer. We are where you want to be. Check out our map and see the variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options available including the Kochi Sushi & Steakhouse, the Columbus Theatre, a Super Walmart, and The Roger Williams Park Zoo. Our convenient location means easy access to Routes 295 and 95, and the TF Green Airport — making your commute or travel that much easier to complete. Providence, Warwick, and Newport are nearby and offer additional retail options. Contact us today to schedule a tour of our beautiful apartments in Cranston, RI, or apply online! We’re excited to welcome you home at Independence Place.
-Wall to wall carpet throughout living and bedroom
-24-Hour Fitness Center and Virtual Fitness Center

title: Spacious, Pet Friendly, Laundry in Home, GREAT Location!
description: Have the Convenience of Washer & Dryer in Your Home!
Two Bedroom One Bath: $1,450.00 HEAT*HOT WATER*COOKING GAS*INCLUDED!!
Leasing Office Address: 444 Meshanticut Valley Parkway | Cranston, RI
Only $299 for Security Deposit! Call for Details!

Centrally located in Western Cranston, Western Hills Village offers the comforts and conveniences you have come to expect. Western Hills is minutes from Providence allowing you to explore the capital city and all it has to offer. You can soak up the sun at Rhode Island's famous beaches, which are only a short drive away. You can shop ‘til you drop in the heart of Cranston in Garden City Center and Chapel View Plaza, which feature many stores, boutiques, and fine dining. Our cozy one and two bedroom apartments come well-appointed with all the features and fine finishes uniquely created with you in mind. We offer fully-equipped gourmet kitchens with updated cabinets, modern countertops, in-unit washers and dryers, ample closet space, plank flooring available*, 9 foot ceilings, and so much more! We have something to offer for everyone! Our charming community is pet friendly, so bring the whole family!
Some Paid Utilities (Heat, Hot Water & Cooking Gas)

Centrally located in Western Cranston, Western Hills Village offers the comforts and conveniences you have come to expect. Western Hills is minutes from Providence allowing you to explore the capital city and all it has to offer. You can soak up the sun at Rhode Island's famous beaches, which are only a short drive away. After a long day at the beach, you can shop until you drop in the heart of Cranston in Garden City Center and Chapel View Plaza, which feature many stores, boutiques, and fine dining. Our cozy one and two bedroom apartments come well-appointed with all the features and fine finishes uniquely created with you in mind. We offer fully-equipped gourmet kitchens with updated cabinets, modern countertops, in-unit washers and dryers, ample closet space, 9 foot ceilings, and so much more! We have something to offer for everyone! Our charming community is pet friendly, so bring the whole family!
Some Paid Utilities (Heat, Hot Water & Cooking Gas)

title: Unique Rhode Island 1 BED/1 BATH unit situated in Western Cranston!!
description: Charming 1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom in a beautiful in the heart of Cranston. Apartment features Beautiful hardwood floors, original details, updated kitchen with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances. Updated bathroom including walk-in shower. Includes back patio, central air, with ELECTRIC included.Walk to all the wonderful restaurants & shops, minutes to Providence.

title: The weather outside is frightful, but our apts are delightful!
description: Where are luxury apartments in Cranston, Rhode Island? Independence Place at 75 Independence Way, that’s where! Independence Place delivers the amenities, location, and the service you expect from the community you call home. We offer online payments, online work orders, and 24-hour emergency maintenance. Our professional staff has your interests at heart. Browse through our photos and get a feel for the details that make up our living space and see the community amenities we provide. Take a look at our floor plans and select the one that meets your needs. Our apartments are designed for real living — our kitchens have all the appliances you need, we have wall-to-wall carpeting in the living room and bedrooms, the master bedroom features a walk-in closet, and you’ll love soaking in our oversized tubs. The welcome warmth of a gas fireplace can be yours at Independence Place. Do you dream of relaxing on your own private balcony, enjoying a cup of tea? Do you fantasize over doing laundry in your own apartment instead of lugging loads to the laundromat? Have you deliberated over whether driving to the gym is worth the hassle? Wonder no more. Independence Place community and apartment amenities mean you can have that cup of tea, do laundry in your in-apartment washer and dryer, and use our swimming pool, fitness center and virtual fitness room to stay in shape. Take a look and see all the amenities we offer. We are where you want to be. Check out our map and see the variety of shopping, dining, and entertainment options available including the Kochi Sushi & Steakhouse, the Columbus Theatre, a Super Walmart, and The Roger Williams Park Zoo. Our convenient location means easy access to Routes 295 and 95, and the TF Green Airport — making your commute or travel that much easier to complete. Providence, Warwick, and Newport are nearby and offer additional retail options. Contact us today to schedule a tour of our beautiful apartments in Cranston, RI, or apply online! We’re excited to welcome you home at Independence Place.
-Wall to wall carpet throughout living and bedroom
-24-Hour Fitness Center and Virtual Fitness Center
